title: Red-Eyed Tree Frog
desc:
Post 3123
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The Red-Eyed Tree Frog, while not poisonous, is able to scare less knowledgable unwanted guests. It may select a target to block all Investigating and Killing type roles from that target.
Attributes -
- The skin of a Red-Eyed Tree Frog is very absorbent. The second time it successfully prevents an attack, it will die.
- The Red-Eyed Tree Frog excels from heights. It will learn who visits its target.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and kill those who want to destroy it.
